sub_title: Member Supervisory & Advisory boards, Consultant, Urban Professional, Peter G de Bois, MSc has a premium account
summary:
I am an architect and urban designer dedicated to work on the development of cities and by that in a fact on society. I became in time, by working with lots of talented students, excellent assistants and dear colleagues, a designer of my own thoughts and actions in understanding the way humanity created daily urban life in time, actions and places to experience and master their unavoidable cultural existence due to dynamical physical, social and economic interaction to achieve moments of peaceful continuity in existence. 

The creation of societal value is based on the quality of public-private network systems -flows & places- in which personal talents, collective needs and confrontation over time could exits and enhance, leading to democracy, emancipation and citizenship based on mutual care and governance.

New societal and technological developments can knock on the door to play a role of significance within the urban societal system.

Cities need to be the key to innovative and sustainable conditions for every person in age, race, background and lifestyle; they become vital and smart when they know how to govern the assets mentioned and facilitate people optimally in their daily urban system, physically, mentally and virtually.

profile_positions.description:
The office is active on research & design of Urban Flows & Places, specialized in Urban Analysis and the interpretation of Spatial Statistics.

The office connects experts for in-company training programs and master classes, consultancy and coaching of stakeholders and professionals regarding urban design & planning, we facilitate lectures and keynote speeches on (inter)national seminars and congresses.

It concerns understanding the system of the physical construct of ‘urban flows’ – public networks- and ‘urban places’ –collective destinations, urban anchor points- who facilitate cities in their challenge to become vital. Urban Vitality derives from a strong physical interrelation and effective functional interaction between urban flows and places. It’s all about timing and synchronization between intensive -public and private- dynamics, coincidence on public-domain and economic liveliness on private domain to initiate an omnipotent ‘daily urban’ system for users and inhabitants of cities........Its about knowing where you are and why
profile_positions.title: Founder Office4UrbanreSearch

profile_positions.description: HET KENNISLAB IS EEN EXTERN R&D-LAB. In het Kennislab voor Urbanisme werken ondernemingen, kennisinstellingen, overheid, media en overige organisaties samen aan het ontwikkelen en ijken van nieuwe kennis voor de stedenbouwkundige vragen van vandaag. Het Kennislab voor Urbanisme is een extern R&D-lab. Onze partners mogen hun vragen voorleggen aan het lab; de studenten in het lab komen met creatieve oplossingen die worden getoetst in de praktijk. Dat doen we in Amersfoort en de Amsterdamse Westas en sinds september 2015 ook in het Duitse Ruhrgebied.
profile_positions.title: Member & Coach of the Knowledge-lab for Urbanism

profile_positions.description:
The public domain is the spatial network of ‘FLOWS & PLACES’ in which emancipation and confrontation over the centuries have led to democracy and citizenship, and in which new societal and technological transition announce themselves constantly to play a role of significance and thus need a position within the urban system and live of people.

Public domain must be inclusive and the actual assingment in cities are related to the quality of place, space and infrastructure next to the urgent needs to enhance the quality of clean air, climate resilience and adaptation.
profile_positions.title: Member jury of the 'Best Public Space Award'

profile_positions.description: Working together with the editors and organization of Elba-Rec media on the actual content of the magazine, http://www.elba-rec.nl/
profile_positions.title: Editor in Chief 'Vitale stad'

profile_positions.description: From the 90th in the past century I worked on matters of urban research & design assignments in a long range of cities, related to physical, social-economic and cultural qualities of daily urban life for inhabitants, enterprises and urban programs, in order to achieve a better Urban Vitality and effective value creations for the society as a whole.
profile_positions.title: Urban Professional

profile_positions.description: Mattmo is a strategic communications and design agency. For your challenges we create inspiring solutions at all levels of your business providing the added value of creativity. We are concept-thinkers, developers, designers, consultants, and innovators. This drives us to learn, explore boundaries and enter uncharted territory. Always looking for inspiration, the next innovation, a cause to stand by or an idea to bring to life.
profile_positions.title: In-Company Advisor MATTMO, 'creative strategic communication and design’

profile_positions.description: I am a designer through all level of scales, focus on regional and urban systems; I work an urban FLOWS & PLACES, the performance of PUBLIC SPACE and urban ANCHOR POINTS as central themes; the significance of the NETWORK SYSTEM of public spaces for URBAN VITALITY; initiate research into conceptual DESIGN  & STRATEGIES underlying the potential of urban transformation; understanding the directive PRECONDITIONED QUALITY of urban structures; the effective balances in PUBLIC AND PRIVATE INVESTMENT; the power of urban design as SOCIOECONOMIC MOTOR; innovator of URBAN ANALYSIS & DESIGN METHODOLOGY, to understanding DAILY URBAN SYSTEMS of people.
profile_positions.title: Member of the Dutch Society of Urban Design & Planning Professionals, BNSP
Advisory Board, of the Dutch Society of Urban Planning & Design Professionals

profile_positions.description: The Urban-Knowledge.nl expertise platform aims to facilitate understanding, learning, dissemination and execution of knowledge & expertise --theories, methods, instruments and casus-- for spatial analysis of cities & urban areas understanding the creation of socio economic value and urban vitality.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder of the Urban-Knowledge expertise platform

profile_positions.location: Delft University of Technology, the Netherlands

I was co-founder and member of the first board, together we build up the organization for students and professionals within the Urban Design Department of the TUDelft and the Urban discipline.
I stayed in contact for advise when necessary.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder and Honourable Member "POLIS-Platform for Urbanism"

profile_positions.location: Alphen aan de Rijn, the Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
From de beginning of 2015 I was appointed as member for the Supervisory board of the Social Housing association ‘WoonForte', start 2016 as board member attending the interest of tenants, and during 2016 due to the actual merger process as interim chairman of the Remuneration Committee, from the start of 2020 Interim member of the Audit committee. 

Member of the VTW, Association of Supervisory Board Members for Housing Associations.
profile_positions.title: Supervisory Board, of the Social Housing association 'WoonForte'

profile_positions.description: ENTERPRISING AMSTERDAM UNITED. ORAM is the Greater Amsterdam Metropolitan Area’s largest business network and is committed to connecting local entrepreneurs. This is because we firmly believe that we stand stronger together. Our 600 members are an outstanding reflection of enterprising Amsterdam. From multinational to freelancer, from law firm to metal processing company. ORAM works to everyone’s advantage. You are invited to join us in building strong business relationships and spreading the spirit of enterprise.
